about_me.des: I am a student programmer. I love C# programming. I enjoy techiques of Mircosoft like .NET, Azure and Xamarin.

projects.project1: IP Configurator is a program that helps you to set up IP more easily. It can be set easily without going through the control panel.
projects.project2: nuwanda22.github.io is a project to build my blog through GitHub page. it was built like dynamic paging by Jekyll.
projects.project3: Xaccount Book is a account book application developed through Xamarin.
projects.project4: GitHub Blog is a service that makes it easier to manage pages built with GitHub page.
projects.familycode: This is a shopping mall in wechat, it promotes gene detection. Since time is precious, I write this website with Django, jQuery, weui. This is WuxiNextcode's major product. You can scan project's picture by wechat.

career.career4_des: I am preparing to graduate from my school.
career.career3_des: I develop practical skills through internship projects and personal projects.
career.career2_des: In jiransoft, I joined team that develops security solution based on whitelist technique.
career.career1_des: I entered Daedeok Software Meister High School in March 2015.
